website_summaries.verdict: Offers a large screen and impressive feature set that includes accessory bundle, GPS, Bluetooth, and responsive technology.
pros: Syncs easily to a smart device thanks to the responsive Bluetooth connectivity
Comes with a comprehensive accessory kit
cons: If you've owned an older model, it may take some time to get used to the interface

customer_reviews.title: I love that it came quick & the split screen you ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that it came quick & the split screen you get when you're driving to make sure you get off at the exact right exit works Wonders. I got it for my new Driving Job.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Pace

customer_reviews.title: High end unit
customer_reviews.text: I go to many customer locations over a large area. With this unit, I save them as a favorite and can always get there as fast as possible. I use my phone a lot so I don't want to use my phone. Besides, the separate GPS unit does the job more efficiently. But Garmin has made it so transferring favorites is easy with their Express but it only does a partial job. I'm having to re-enter a number of customers. Also, volume is not as loud as my model 50. Otherwise, it's just getting used to different placement of icons. And why did you change favorites to a heart?
customer_reviews.author: Big Gilby

customer_reviews.title: Garmin DriveSmart 61 NA- LMT-S-mt
customer_reviews.text: Great product with case and easy map to follow and hear. Liked the way it tells you to stay to the right 3 lanes or splitting lane, etc. Also had some accessories that Beach Camera threw in. Very nice and quickly received. Comes with map updates.
customer_reviews.author: MT- San Fran

customer_reviews.title: What a great little thing
customer_reviews.text: What a great little thing! Gets me where I need to go. Simple setup. Fast shipping and the accessories are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Like this one SO much better than the last GPS I purchased!!!
customer_reviews.text: The last one I had would often lag, and tell me to turn when I was already at the place to turn. This one has been reliable so far, and I've had it a couple of months. I drive around all day long, seeing clients, and my route changes daily. The screen is large, there is voice command available- I can't touch the GPS when I'm driving- California state law. The ONLY complaint I have is that I have to hook it up to my cell phone to get traffic info. I don't want to use my phone data when driving. But other than that, I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra R.

customer_reviews.title: It worked as promised
customer_reviews.text: My Toyota Tundra has a gps sytem but was outdated and didn't include Mexico! They wanted $200 dollars and the latest update was 2012. I ordered this unit at the same price for a brand new unit with all the new bells and whistles. I will let you know about Mexico travels at a latter date!
customer_reviews.author: court1

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work fine so far
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time. I promptly misplaced the power cord. I chatted on line with Garmin and they told me several places where I could get a replacement. First time I power it up it came right on. Seems to work fine so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer  Kathy Kingsbury Roessler

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy from the supplier
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with outdated US maps. It arrived with no instruction manual and there is no way to insert a SD card in order to install International maps. This wasn’t the most expensive but was still an expensive GPS.
customer_reviews.author: Foodie

customer_reviews.title: love this.
customer_reviews.text: This was to replace an old garmin that was dying. I love the size no problem in my honda odyssey. I love the updates, just plug into the wall, the screen is bright and crisp, instructions fine....I used my old traffic cord and can voice command questions about traffic. I don't understand the negative reviews. Now WAZE is extremely accurate and we use that too and I still love a paper map but this garmin is definitely an awesome tool.
customer_reviews.author: Ghislainemaureen

customer_reviews.title: after two days, seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: Though the description doesn't make it very clear, this GPS DOES have the capacity to save "Favorites." In fact, my high school exchange student figured out how to sync my old GPS, which was failing due to problems with the connections, with this new one, and she saved my "Favorites" into the new one, using the heart-shaped icon. It worked out great. another nice feature is that the screen is large enough that it can show nearby restaurants and gas stations on the map. There's a clip on the back for holding the pointer, which does work better than finger-touching (though using fingers on this model is no more difficult than with any other).
customer_reviews.author: Robin C.

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished! Buyer beware!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought mine last year...just found out that this product is a refurbished product!!!!! Not brand new!! Mine is broken already as the screen will not turn on. Only been used once. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Better than my old one, but still needs improvements.
customer_reviews.text: Voice option is very difficult to train, I haven't mastered it yet. It took me on a couple of wrong turns ignoring/changing the route I had planned. I like the Base Camp option so I can plan my routes on the computer and download to the Garmin unit. Nice screen and provides turn distance and names on exit signs or street name along with voice instruction, which can be late when driving in town. (Turn now when you are already moving into the turn)
customer_reviews.author: Ducky

customer_reviews.title: Farming Smart Drive 61
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived a day earlier then expected. Charged it up but ran into some problems trying to update the maps and register. Luckily my husband is more computer saved than I and he was able to work his magic. I took it out and tested it - worked great! Love the big display. Even better the step by step directions so I don't have to look at the display! Can't wait for a trip to really test it out!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry G.

customer_reviews.title: As sold, traffic information needs the use of you smart phone
customer_reviews.text: The power cord does not include an FM receiver for traffic information. While it can be set up to use your smart phone, that's two way communication. Two way communications means information about you, for example where you are, can be sent to whomever. Besides, your phone data plan is being used. Also, cell phone reception coverage may not be as good as FM coverage. The couple of power cords with FM receivers of older Garmin GPS units I've had do not work with this GPS unit and so I'll have to spend $50 or so for a compatible power cord. The GPS unit itself works great.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R

customer_reviews.title: Worked Once Before becoming Inoperable
customer_reviews.text: It is unlikely that I will ever purchase another Garmin GPS. I've used Garmin products for years with no problems at all. That stellar record ended when I purchased the DriveSmart 61 NA LMT-S Advanced Navigation GPS. The first one arrived and would not start so it was returned with no problems. The replacement worked fine the first time I used it. The second time I needed it was unfortunately after the return period. It would not turn on. Now, I have a $280 paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Minneapolis

customer_reviews.title: This is a mis leading product....EXTREMELY disapointed!
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT do TRAFFIC, DOES NOT come with traffic cable, MISLEADING FALSE CLAIMS by Garmin!!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this model.
customer_reviews.text: I have had garmin gps units for over 20 years and have always been satisfied. This unit is excellent. Besides giving accurate directions it alerts for everything- speed, obstacles, traffic. Great system. It was expense but worth the money. Very accurate. Screen is clear as glass. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful piece of technology.
customer_reviews.text: What a dandy, it even shows me when curves are coming up. The only suggestion I would make is that you enter the name of the city and state first then the street and number. The way it's set up now you have to scroll through umpteen city states to find what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Updates are easy to retrieve.
customer_reviews.text: Uploading the updated maps was easy. I've only been using the DriveSmart for a few days, but it has been working well. This is a replacement for an older Garmin and this has some newer features, that I have yet, to explore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I read all the negative reviews before buying this gps. Always had good results from Garmin products. So far I have nothing negative to say about this product. It is a complicated electronic device. Just read the instructions, set the device up right. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent GPS Experience
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and was easy to set up. Working flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Chipboarder

customer_reviews.title: A terrible product. Can't believe it is a Garmin product.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. On a normal sunny day in California, it would go overheat and went dark. The route calculation seems to be weird, which indirectly caused me into a car accident. I owned a Garmin before, and it worked way much better. The design of this unit is pretty, but very unstable... I won't recommend it.. If I can return, refund, or swap another model, I would definitely do it... wasted money on this....
customer_reviews.author: cooler

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Could not get the voice actuated instructions to recognize my voice .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The case that comes with this bundle is worthless
customer_reviews.text: The GPS is fine, however the case is pretty worthless as all of the required appurtenances do not fit in the case..it is too shallow. The screen protector is a "cut to fit" not pre cut to fit this gps.
customer_reviews.author: DLR

customer_reviews.title: larger screen
customer_reviews.text: This unit has a larger screen and better search capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Papa

customer_reviews.title: Great GPS
customer_reviews.text: GPS is used for truck driving, etc...as of now it is working great and easy to use...7" screen is marvelous!
customer_reviews.author: Sandee

customer_reviews.title: Lost no more
customer_reviews.text: This is truly state of the art. It does everything for you but drive the car. For anyone who doesn’t have dashboard GPS this is the best! And, even then I can’t believe it wouldn’t be superior. Great addition!!
customer_reviews.author: Coelacanth64

customer_reviews.title: The large screen is awesome! It's more expensive
customer_reviews.text: I received the product quickly, and it was well-packed. The large screen is awesome! It's more expensive, but I can see details easily. I like Voice Command for hands-free navigation - it understands most of what I ask. Performs better if radio is turned off. I already have blue-tooth phone in my car, but it's easy to turn the phone off on the unit. I'm pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clarity and warinings
customer_reviews.text: I had an old garmin and needed updating. The voice is better to understand and love the speed and curve warnings since I drive a log truck. Can’t wait to save my routes as I avoid interstates.
customer_reviews.author: keithcheek

customer_reviews.title: traffic
customer_reviews.text: GPS sometimes wont turn on when pressing the on button. Traffic does not tell when there is a slow down or construction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Te GPS itself is great.
customer_reviews.text: The Garmin GPS is perfect. I like that Garmin gives you free map updates every few weeks. The "deluxe bundle" is a collection of marginal quality accessories. The "multi port car charger" is loose in the car socket and not really useable.
customer_reviews.author: M. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Just by the GPS.
customer_reviews.text: The GPS is great however the package I would not recommend getting. Within a few days of using the three-way adapter it broke as you can see. You got me again China....
customer_reviews.author: Ash M.

customer_reviews.title: Great updated version
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Got it because it has maps in Mexico. My old one did not have this.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen T.

customer_reviews.title: Never turned on.
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box, it did not work. Left it charging overnight and still didn’t turn on. Tried holding the power button and restarting like some people say to reboot it and still no power.
customer_reviews.author: Mig Ru

customer_reviews.title: Good price and fast shipping, fairly easy to program trips
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a long trip out west. Just finished programming the trip and happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: CMO

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had a different one.
customer_reviews.text: Had to do an upgrade right after we bought so it would work right . It function s ok its just some of her direction s are not the best, it may take you 10 or more miles out of the way even when on shortest route
customer_reviews.author: Carol Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Garmin DriveSmart 61 bundle
customer_reviews.text: Garmin is still new to me. It’s really too soon for me to rate but I think I’m going to love it. I attached it to the bottom of my windshield, just right of my steering wheel, with the included bracket. I like that it quietly tings as I’m entering in to a new speed zone. The voice is very easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: LaStar

customer_reviews.title: Hard to hear and be heard using Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth speaker functioning is not great. Very hard to hear someone using it and as for them hearing you, even worse especially when you factor in road noise. Also, voice prompt didn’t recognize me half the time and was just more annoying than anything else. I wanted to love this but sadly had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Lang

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny and more
customer_reviews.text: I love this easy to update easy to use Very good customer Service quality is so good
customer_reviews.author: shadow04

customer_reviews.title: Garmin builds them right
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered for a friend but I set it up for her and I also own a Garmin and like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Toniatti

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit and beats both my Magellan units hands over. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne M. Forguson

customer_reviews.title: Great screen size for old eyes!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the screen size on this unit. Easy to read no matter where I place it. Still playing with it to learn all the features but it was easy "plug and play" for our first road trip.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my very first GPS and I love it!! My order didn't come with a booklet to help me understand it but I went on the Garmin site and got the info I needed.
customer_reviews.author: cupcake47

customer_reviews.title: Best Navigation
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy to use. And how screen changes for night driving
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kier

customer_reviews.title: Garmin is the best in my books
customer_reviews.text: I have been converted to Garmin for a lot of different reasons but mostly for the size and quality of the screen and the quality of the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Glad I ordered......
customer_reviews.text: Great travel tool. Better than trying to use phone mapping.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie

customer_reviews.title: Gets me there every time.
customer_reviews.text: Large and easy to see,loud enough with the radio low. Easy to program.
customer_reviews.author: 53rdspirit

customer_reviews.title: Great navigation
customer_reviews.text: Works great for out of town trips. Suprised it even shows what lane to be in when exiting some ramps.
customer_reviews.author: IJM

customer_reviews.title: Set up your device before heading out on a trip.
customer_reviews.text: I was traveling from Michigan to Rhode Island and put my home address in for the first time. It took many tries to nagigation gor my trip to my house address. I was on the road at a truck stop gasing up. I made me feel anxious. After 10 attempts it failly pulled up the route. I was wonder after that I never missed a turn.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kent

customer_reviews.title: Life traffic information needs to use your phone
customer_reviews.text: This design is stupid, and the product introduction is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: M Z

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived when promised...packaged well... everything included in package as stated...so far works perfectly,,,very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great GPS
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best Garmin I have used. Seem to have a mind of its own
customer_reviews.author: Deltafoxfire

customer_reviews.title: GOOD unit
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the fact that it did not have traffic update without being connected to my phone.
customer_reviews.author: daniel reino

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I haves used one of these for years and still prefer it over all Phone & Built in units!
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: MPH Displayed on the unit is not accurate. I have not used it yet. I had a experienced truck driving friend try it out for me. He said that it worked pretty good with the exception of the miles per hour not being accurate
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use, large screen and accuracy you get for your money.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It works great. The best GPS I ever owned. Accurate, easy to use and a big screen are the characteristics I like the most.
customer_reviews.author: RAMON ROMAN

customer_reviews.title: Just got the Garmin Drive Smart 61 NA LMT-S
customer_reviews.text: Just got the Garmin Drive Smart 61 NA LMT-S. It is very easy to setup, edge to edge dtsplay, easy to follow direction, its great.
customer_reviews.author: May Tse

customer_reviews.title: Get familiar with it before getting stuck in traffic couldn't find alternative route.
customer_reviews.text: No instructions for someone who's never used one before they need instructions. The extra plug that was sent will not stay in cigarette light so can't hook anything else without taking it all apart which is hard when driving.
customer_reviews.author: April Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Garmin DriveSmart 61 NA LMT-S
customer_reviews.text: Very nice to have a Garmin that updates the maps via WiFi! I travel with a Verizon hotspot and updated my software and maps while driving down I-95! Very clear screen and a lot of very nice new features.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gps
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 different gps wish I had found this one first.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I like the many features and it is easy to learn
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked as hoped.
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it! It is working as expected. Screen is beautiful and features are functional. Hands free phone works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tells you how to get anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Software was easy to learn and I love how it tells you exactly what lane to be in at every major turn.
customer_reviews.author: cory fields

customer_reviews.title: Size and clarity is great
customer_reviews.text: I like the screen size and clarity. Works great for directions. Would recommend this Garmin.
customer_reviews.author: jkstransky

customer_reviews.title: Good unit smart link don't work.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great with the unit but my smart link has not work, about to just seed it back. That was the only reason I got the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very update design and typical Garmin quality and accuracy.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Clear maps. I like the lifetime maps. Like the phone and bluetooth connection for texts and email. The local weather forecast is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Screen View/Rerouting As You Drive
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping and quality is excellent. Haven't had the chance to use it much so far but I love the large screen and the way it reroutes as you're driving. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great gps
customer_reviews.text: It was ready to use right out of the box! Entered an address and away we went. Very intuitive!
customer_reviews.author: B. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected from Garmin
customer_reviews.text: Just received and so far love this Garmin. Has everything I wanted. Easy to set up and screen size is perfect
customer_reviews.author: TSE

customer_reviews.title: fairly good
customer_reviews.text: When headed to Florida it took me through the campus of Princeton.....did not appreciate. Other such errors also occurred. Good if you are lost.
customer_reviews.author: POPs

customer_reviews.title: GARMIN DRIVE 61  NA LMT-S
customer_reviews.text: UNTIL NOW...WORK GOOD....I NEED MORE TIME TO GO TO MORE PLACES....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: We’ll be using it for traveling. Best new feature is updating via WiFi instead of tethering to computer. We are satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine L. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Image shows screen protectors. Description of what is included ...
customer_reviews.text: Image shows screen protectors. Description of what is included does not mention them. I went by the image showing what was included. Guess it's on me but the Seller needs to remove the screen protectors from the image!!!!
customer_reviews.author: john wortham

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I own 5 GPS and they are all Garmin brand, which for me is the best brand there is. The screen is wide (6 inches), the sound is clear and the look is great.
customer_reviews.author: GILBERTO BURNIER

customer_reviews.title: I work it every day all day
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day all day and it takes me right to the door step
customer_reviews.author: Adonald landers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read screen
customer_reviews.text: Huge screen and easy to use. Received quickly with no problems
customer_reviews.author: Kerrick L. Vandeveer

customer_reviews.title: Has great safety feature, announces speed changes, animal crossings and major curves
customer_reviews.text: I like all of the Navigation features and the hands free features
customer_reviews.author: Dontech

customer_reviews.title: Screen saver is useless
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why they include a screen saver that’s too small for the screen????????
customer_reviews.author: james rose

customer_reviews.title: Garmin is very clean and delivery was on time!
customer_reviews.text: Garmin is very clean and delivery was on time! I have not used it yet but it looks like it will fit my needs very well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stearns

customer_reviews.title: Great GPS
customer_reviews.text: I think this GPS is wonderful I even used it in Jamaica, it did show where to eat and the gas station were.
customer_reviews.author: jim wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Best GPS I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth Garmin and I love it. Took it on two trips in the first month we had it. The voice commands work great! If you need a GPS, this is the one to get!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The voice recognition and the bluetooth connection with my phone is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Cencia Short

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Voice command never worked on this product had to return
customer_reviews.author: Raghib Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I love that you can update thru the device itself using WiFi!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Quintanilla

customer_reviews.title: product as advertised. Last year I bought a 5" ...
customer_reviews.text: product as advertised. Last year I bought a 5" Garmin at Costco for $280 with camera. this is about 7" with no camera, which I don't need. I paid $215 at Beach Camera. Since then, price has risen to $265.
customer_reviews.author: Crybaby

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't include screen protectors
customer_reviews.text: Just got the bundle in the mail accessories seem good quality but was disappointed to not be able to put the screen protector on the GPS because the bundle did not actually include them even though they were in the picture. I will have to wait till I get a screen protector to use my GPS.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Item
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong item all the wait for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fast delivery. Was ahead of schedule.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to someone else. Am hoping they like it.
customer_reviews.author: gloria klare

customer_reviews.title: Maps are Old and unhelpful even after updates
customer_reviews.text: Maps are about 2-3 years old after updating. That’s poor service given all the hype about this Garmin products. Can’t get Live Traffic working and the same for Parking info feature. No instructions or either included and I have a feeling they may be paid “features” that require subscriptions. Google maps is better and free.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: I drove for Lyft for two-a-half years....
customer_reviews.text: and I have never found an app that works anywhere near as well as the Garmin GPS'es that I have owned. As soon as one direction is completed, it gives the next one. It tells you what lane to be in, and often gives landmarks, as in "turn right after the Shell station." A lot of phone apps give you about thirty seconds warning to cross two or three lanes, and my all time favorites, "Go North" or "Go toward downtown." The only complaint I have is with voice command. I often have to repeat myself two or three times, although what the GPS thinks I've said is often quite amusing.
customer_reviews.author: Jama Chorush

customer_reviews.title: This is a mis leading product....EXTREMELY disapointed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an older Garmin....I like the older one better. This 61 is flakey...sometimes you have to touch the back arrow to make it work properly. Also..and this is a big one....for the price that I paid for this, I should have received the traffic adaptor/charging cord. I had to by it seperate after I found out that the 61T itself does not give traffic reports and re routing. I would have expected a much better product. In fact I may return it because I think it is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Finite Guy

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for a Hospice Nurse
customer_reviews.text: I have to drive all over two large counties to visit my patients in their homes. I would literally be lost without this device. It does not lag when I enter an address (waiting for sattelite, as my old gps did) and has not had any issues with weather. Also love how big the screen is. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Time to ditch Garmin
customer_reviews.text: It is unbelievable how bad Garmin products have become. The device freezes every now and then. I got into trouble several times when Garmin stopped working in the middle of my trip. I have used Garmin. GPS for over 10 years and I can see how drastically their quality has dropped. I am switching.
customer_reviews.author: Mike J

customer_reviews.title: this is awesome. Also added the Europe map for trip in ...
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from cheaper model and no regrets, this is awesome. Also added the Europe map for trip in Sept of 2018....pre programmed our trip way points. Many features.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Henuber

customer_reviews.title: Great BUT inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: The thing was great right up to the point where the on/ off button quit working. Of course it is beyond the return period. So now I have to unplug it every time I end a drive. Very inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Great for my Jeep Wrangler - easy to read screen - just the right prompts when needed (not too late like other models)
customer_reviews.author: Gene ferrell

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Other than a pain getting it the computer to recognize it, and no hard copies manual everything is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Died in less than 9 months
customer_reviews.text: It would shut off some times and restart now when you plug in to power source screen goes dark. my old Garmin has over 300,000 miles on it and still works this model was supposed to best of top ten.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Garmin DriveSmart 61 NA LMT-S Advanced Navigation GPS with Smart Features Deluxe Bundle
product_meta.description: Bundle Includes Garmin DriveSmart 61 NA LMT-S GPS PocketPro XL Hardshell Case Universal DC12V/24V 4 Port USB Car Charger Stylus Pen with Pocket Clip Microfiber Cloth Advanced Navigation with Smart Features Easy-to-use GPS navigator with connected features and bright 6.95-inch capacitive touch edge-to-edge display Detailed maps of North America with free lifetime updates Provides real-time services such as live traffic and live parking Bluetooth calling, smart notifications and voice-activated navigation Built-in Wi-Fi for easy map and software updates Stay connected behind the wheel with Garmin DriveSmart, the navigator that features a collection of smart features in addition to helpful driver alerts and easy-to-follow directions. From hands-free calling and live traffic information to built-in Wi-Fi and more - the future is on your Garmin. Just look ahead and drive. Live Services for Your Drive Outsmart traffic jams with time-saving alternate routes or by avoiding them altogether. Then, with live information, spend less time circling the block to look for parking. For traffic alerts, relevant rerouting directions and up-to-date weather forecasts, download the Smartphone Link app, which connects your Garmin DriveSmart with your compatible smartphone. As you near your destination, take the stress out of parking by viewing pricing and availability trends for on-street public parking. The Smartphone Link app also enables LiveTrack, which lets drivers share their loc...
feature_bullets: Stay connected behind the wheel with Garmin DriveSmart, the navigator that features a collection of smart features in addition to helpful driver alerts and easy-to-follow directions.
When you sync your Bluetooth-enabled smartphone to Garmin DriveSmart, you get great features that let you stay connected without taking your hands off the wheel.
To encourage safer driving and increase situational awareness, Garmin DriveSmart provides driver alerts for sharp curves, speed changes, railroad crossings and animal crossings.

When you pair this navigator with your compatible Garmin smartwatch (sold separately), you can receive navigation right on your wrist, even after you've parked your car and are walking toward your destination.
Bundle Includes: Garmin DriveSmart 61 NA LMT-S GPS, PocketPro XL Hardshell Case, Universal DC12V/24V 4 Port USB Car Charger, Stylus Pen with Pocket Clip, Microfiber Cloth
